overview: The film revolves around a girl from a poor family, who loses her parents at a very young age. Armed with the never-say-die attitude towards life, she manages to move ahead against all odds, with a dream in her eyes. She exercises the responsibility of taking care of her only younger brother and grooming him with utmost affection and tolerance. It is when the future looks bright in her eyes, her life is bombarded with unexpected and shocking turn of events.
tagline: Crime Offence Focus Fear Emotion Enemy
title: Coffee
